attributes.action: Softening the Earning Requirement under HSMP for International Students
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We all are students at the moments. And worried about our future because of current credit crunch. Its not easy to get a good job for fresher in current situations. And It seems to impossible for us to meet current earning requiremets under HSMP TIER1.


We would like the prime minister to soften the earning requirements for international students because of the time it takes to secure permanent employment that would generate the required earnings.
